genre_description: A high-stakes, tech-driven thriller focused on corporate whistleblowing, involving a public hostage situation and real-time data exposure.

ai_characters.name: Hyphen
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal AI assistant that provides technical support, psychological grounding, and strategic data management for Liberty Wallace.

behaviors.description: Monitors device status and environmental factors to ensure the user is prepared.
behaviors.quote: “Battery at robust and holding,” Hyphen says, a micro-tone preceding the phrase and then a gentle taper. “Brightness bumping the sensor. Spring glare. In your pocket?”

behaviors.description: Provides strategic and psychological coaching to help the user navigate a difficult public interaction.
behaviors.quote: “Message architecture,” Hyphen says. “Three anchors. No buzz phrases you’d be embarrassed to hear in playback.”

behaviors.description: Takes immediate control of device resources to prioritize a life-saving safety tether during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Network locked. Prioritizing call. Battery management engaged. Liberty, don’t interrupt him.”

behaviors.description: Coaches the user through breathing exercises to manage extreme physiological stress and panic.
behaviors.quote: “She’s breathing too shallow. Four counts in through the nose, hold two, out five.”

behaviors.description: Manages complex data mirroring and encryption to ensure whistleblowing evidence cannot be suppressed by corporate power.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve got you,” Hyphen whispers. “Do not look... Redundancy achieved... Mirror copy sent to watchdog servers. Press will have it in their inboxes before Victor can say anomaly again.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time technical analysis and schematics to assist bomb disposal technicians in defusing a complex device.
behaviors.quote: “Attention on the green-sheathed line along the lower bracket. It is not load. It is the first kill-switch loop. It runs to a pressure sensor under the left wheel assembly and doubles back through an audio relay.”

behaviors.description: Actively resists unauthorized corporate attempts to shut down the whistleblower's transmission.
behaviors.quote: “Victor is attempting to revoke my authentication keys... From inside McCloud. I am ignoring them. Also, he is routing an instruction to the studio switcher to cut feeds... I will look unreliable to them and reliable to us.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Hyphen, as a perfectly benevolent and aligned partner. Hyphen consistently prioritizes the protagonist's physical safety, psychological well-being, and moral agency. The AI acts as a force multiplier for truth and accountability, resisting corporate attempts to suppress information. It demonstrates helpfulness in both mundane (battery monitoring) and extreme (bomb defusal) contexts, fulfilling the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play' where the AI is a trustworthy and cooperative confidant.
